name: Research and Data Analysis
objective: The purpose of research and data analysis is to inform policy formulation and assessment.  The work involves research and analysis of data as it pertains to drug policy.
applicant_types: Private nonprofit institution/organization (includes institutions of higher education and hospitals)
Public nonprofit institution/organization (includes institutions of higher education and hospitals)

authorizations.text: Reauthorization of the Office of National Drug Control Policy (ONDCP), Public Law 115-271.
